code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

representedOrganization.name: Riverside Plastic Surgery and Sinus Center:

td.content: s:patient describes severe painful and red left eye, severe seeing halos around the light, severe nausea and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. pt is a male nutritionist aged 69 years. drinks daily he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 180 cm, Weight 51.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 62, Respiration 14 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

tr.td: Riverside Plastic Surgery and Sinus Center:

td.content: s:pt c/o 11 days h/o severe seeing halos around the light. NKDA. he is a 69 YO m. o:Height 180 cm, Weight 52.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed apraclonidine 0.5% - 1 drp 1-2 drops affected eye 3 x day, and ordered 360-degree suture canaloplasty - eye.

tr.td: UC San Diego Medical Center - Hillcrest

td.content: s:a 70 yr old male nutritionist presents with severe painful and red left eye, severe nausea, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. patient also reports of severe seeing halos around the light. denies any smoking describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 2 years in his past o:Height 180 cm, Weight 52 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Vision Test (+) Corneal Thickness on evaluation a:Glaucoma p:administered apraclonidine 0.5% - 1 drp 1-2 drops affected eye 3 x day, performed Vision Test, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

content2.Unmatched: , Vision Test (+) Corneal Thickness on evaluation
